TriggerOraclev10g.name: PROS_STAT_CS
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
DECLARE
/*

This trigger to log actions into osd.process_status table

*/
v_count number;

BEGIN

IF DBMS_REPUTIL.FROM_REMOTE = FALSE THEN

if inserting then

update osd.process_status set
action_code = 101, -- ???? ???
in_date = :new.sader_date_yy||'/'||LPAD (TO_CHAR(:new.sader_date_mm),2,'0')||'/'||LPAD(TO_CHAR (:new.sader_date_dd),2,'0'),
department_no = :new.department_no,
dept_code = :new.recieved_to_code,
sent_user = :new.user_id,
sader_no = :new.sader_no,
time_flag = sysdate
where process_no = :new.process_no
and :new.linked <> 1; -- ??????

elsif updating then

update osd.process_status set
action_code = 101,
in_date = :new.sader_date_yy||'/'||LPAD (TO_CHAR(:new.sader_date_mm),2,'0')||'/'||LPAD(TO_CHAR (:new.sader_date_dd),2,'0'),
department_no = :new.department_no,
dept_code = :new.recieved_to_code,
sent_user = :new.user_id,
sader_no = :new.sader_no,
time_flag = sysdate
where process_no = :old.process_no
and :new.linked <> 1;

end if;

end if;

exception
when no_data_found then null;

END;
